org.shared.metaclass

Interface ResourceRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileSystemRegistry, JarRegistry, RegistryClassLoader

    public interface ResourceRegistry
    Defines a registry for looking up class path resources.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      URL getResource(String pathname)
      Gets a resource URL corresponding to the given pathname.
      InputStream getResourceAsStream(String pathname)
      Gets an InputStream to the resource at the given pathname.
      Enumeration<URL> getResources(String pathname)
      Gets all resource URLs corresponding to the given pathname.

    • Method Detail

      • getResource

        URL getResource(String pathname)
        Gets a resource URL corresponding to the given pathname.
        Parameters:
        pathname - the resource pathname.
        Returns:
        a resource URL or null if not found.

      • getResources

        Enumeration<URL> getResources(String pathname)
                              throws IOException
        Gets all resource URLs corresponding to the given pathname.
        Parameters:
        pathname - the resource pathname.
        Returns:
        an Enumeration of resource URLs.
        Throws:
        IOException - when something goes awry.

      • getResourceAsStream

        InputStream getResourceAsStream(String pathname)
        Gets an InputStream to the resource at the given pathname.
        Parameters:
        pathname - the resource pathname.
        Returns:
        an InputStream to the resource or null if not found.
